idea:

erection of structures comprising steel modules & assemblies. Fabrication &

erection & Equipment installation of Onshore/Offshore/Oil & Gas/Steel/Marine &Allied Industries.

idea:
GoPhygital is an award-winning startup focused on providing immersive, experiential solutions to its client-partners using Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality, AI-ML, and Game Development / Gamification as the four core offerings. In addition to immersive tech, we also provide mobile app and web development solutions.

GoPhygital has worked with client-partners like Ipca Laboratories, Glenmark, Angel Broking, the Mahindra Group, Pidilite Industries, Procter & Gamble (India), Total Quartz (India), Soujanya Color, Reliance Games, Goethe Institute (New York), ICICI Lombard, Amazon Prime Video, and others, to deliver design and technology solutions across platforms.

As an organization, GoPhygital helps businesses across industries like pharma, healthcare, automotive, manufacturing, retail, advertising, gaming, media and entertainment, BFSI, etc to craft the right solution to address their business needs be it across mobile or web, especially immersive solutions leveraging AR, VR, and Applied Gaming across use cases like training, product showcase, marketing, brand engagement, etc.
name: GOPHYGITAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Rentruck India is a service and parts supplier for Material Handling Equipments  and also a Rental Operator

idea: GTA Petroleum Pvt Ltd  is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your Heavy Machinery / Generator (DG sets) / Buses /Fleet vehicles etc. in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. You can place your order online and get Diesel on demand at your location in specialised Refuellers according to your chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter! When everything in the world is available online, we are going an extra mile.
name: GTA PETROLEUM PRIVATE LIMITED
